mapper.select: select id, tag, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_item_tag where tag = #{tag}
select id, tag, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_item_tag where tag like #{tag}
mapper.insert: insert into t_item_tag( id, tag, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{id}, #{tag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: select distinct tag.id, tag.tag, tag.create_time as createTime, tag.update_time as updateTime from t_item_item_tags it left join t_item_tag tag on it.item_tags = tag.id where it.items = #{itemId} order by tag.tag
select tag.tag as tag, count(tag.tag) as number from t_item_item_tags it inner join t_item i on it.items = i.id inner join t_item_tag tag on it.item_tags = tag.id group by tag.tag
select * from t_item_tag as A,(select item_tags as tag from t_item_item_tags where items=#{itemid}) as B where A.id=B.tag
select count(distinct tag.tag) from t_item_item_tags it inner join t_item as item on item.id = it.items inner join t_item_tag tag on tag.id = it.item_tags
